name: Dr. Sanjay kumar
longDescription: Dr. Sanjay kumar specializes in dyslexia support for children aged 6-12, providing assessments, tutoring, and progress tracking.

name: Mr. Ashok Aravind
longDescription: Mr. Ashok Aravind uses behavioral strategies and coaching to support teenagers in managing ADHD symptoms in academic settings.

name: Ms. Kavita Arun
shortDescription: Therapist with over 10 years of experience.
longDescription: Provides ABA and speech therapy for children with Autism Spectrum Disorders, helping improve communication and social skills.

name: Dr. Nazeem
shortDescription: Works with students with multiple learning challenges.
longDescription: Offers individualized education plans (IEPs) and support for children with dysgraphia, dyscalculia, and more.

name: Mrs. Neha
shortDescription: Experienced in helping children with speech delays.
longDescription: Focuses on phonological awareness and language comprehension in children aged 3-10 years.
